LoginShibboleth.ActivateLdapDesc: Activates using LDAP Part of Plugin. Without this no LDAP queries will be running.
LoginShibboleth.DeleteOldUserDesc: Delete user from system who lost access by login.
LoginShibboleth.Description: Shibboleth Login adapter is all in one solution Login for Piwik, It can use Shibboleth, LDAP or the combination. The Shibboleth parameters should be available in $_SEVER.
LoginShibboleth.LdapActiveData: The active options only will be searched.
LoginShibboleth.LdapActiveDataDesc: Select the sources which should be searched when LDAP is active. It allows user to use LDAP partially, for one or two access groups. This option should have at least one selected.
LoginShibboleth.LdapAdminAttr: Attributes for admin user, separated by Separator
LoginShibboleth.LdapAdminAttrDesc: The attributes which are needed, to decide if user has admin access. They should be separated by Separator and no more than two. The first is the domain, the second is the path. If only one given it will be regarded as domain.
LoginShibboleth.LdapAdminFilterDesc: Filter string which should be used to filter LDAP queries for admin. There is only one variable allowed in filter string which is denoted with ?. It is the username.
LoginShibboleth.LdapDNForAccessSearch: LDAP Distinguished Names for Access Search
LoginShibboleth.LdapDNForAccessSearchDesc: DN which contains the attributes for the Access search. It can be the same as User.
LoginShibboleth.LdapDNForUserSearch: LDAP Distinguished Names for User Search
LoginShibboleth.LdapDNForUserSearchDesc: DN which contains the attributes for the User search. It can be the same as Access.
LoginShibboleth.LdapFunctionsMissing: Ldap function can not be found. install php-ldap
LoginShibboleth.LdapHostDesc: For ldaps use ldaps:// and for LDAP just the hostname.
LoginShibboleth.LdapPasswordDesc: LDAP Password . It will be written as plain text in Piwik config, please don't use your admin LDAP user. Create a read-only access user for Piwik.
LoginShibboleth.LdapSuperUserAttrDesc: The attribute which should be compared to the value set next.
LoginShibboleth.LdapSuperUserFilterDesc: Filter string which should be used to filter LDAP queries for Super User. There is only one variable allowed in filter string which is denoted with ?. It is the username.
LoginShibboleth.LdapSuperUserValue: Value for the LDAP SuperUser attribute
LoginShibboleth.LdapSuperUserValueDesc: The values for each SuperUser attributes must be set here.
LoginShibboleth.LdapUserAliasDesc: When one attribute given, this will be taken as fullname. If two then the first should be the given name and the second one surename.
LoginShibboleth.LdapUserDataActiveDesc: If this option is active, the user data will also be retrieved from LDAP. It will be used when the primary adapter is LDAP. Use it only if you have different data sources for Shibboleth than your active directory system.
LoginShibboleth.LdapUserEmailDesc: Is the key in LDAP result which represent the user's email.
LoginShibboleth.LdapUserNameDesc: LDAP username which will be used to bind to ldap server. It should have access to the attribute used afterwards.
LoginShibboleth.LdapViewAttr: Attributes for view access Group separated by Separator
LoginShibboleth.LdapViewAttrDesc: The attributes which are needed, to decide if user has view access. They should be separated by Separator and no more than two. The first is the domain, the second is the path. If only one given it will be regarded as domain.
LoginShibboleth.LdapViewFilterDesc: Filter string which should be used to filter LDAP queries for view access group. There is only one variable allowed in filter string which is denoted with ?. It is the username.
LoginShibboleth.Loginplug-inEnabledWarning: Piwik default Login plug in is active.
LoginShibboleth.LogOutUrlDesc: URL that the user will be redirected to by pressing the log out button
LoginShibboleth.PrimaryAdapterDesc: Primary Adapter is the the adapter which is chosen to prevail when data is both available on LDAP and Shibboleth, per default shibboleth is selected. This has only effect when LDAP is active.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupLdapActiveDesc: Searches LDAP for the domain from the group name.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupsContainsDomainDesc: The domain can be fetched from the group name. Using the regex (.*) at the end of the group name.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupsDesc: The Admin groups here will be compared to the user groups from Shibboleth. According to the setting, if the group name includes the domain, it will be fetched. Else an attribute must be set, so the domain will be fetched from LDAP. If LDAP is used the DN must also be set.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupsLdapAttrDesc: Domain attribute for the LDAP group search. Will be used when LDAP search is active.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupsLdapDNDesc: Distinguished Names for the LDAP search. Will be used when LDAP search is active.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethGroupDesc: Shibboleth Group string in server header. ($_SERVER)
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethGroupManualDesc: Members of this group will get an extra flag so their user account will be created regardless of them having any rights. The rights will be set by SuperUser after the user has logged in. These rights will not change by the application.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupsOptions: The Options for the view groups from Shibboleth
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethAdminGroupsOptions: The Options for the admin groups from Shibboleth
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethSeparatorDesc: Shibboleth separator can be ; or , or etc. Will be used in the next settings too. Use something unambiguous.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethSuperUserGroupsDesc: The Shibboleth SuperUser group will be matched and the user can login afterwards. SuperUser can manage everything. As a result this group's users should be chosen with care.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethUserAliasDesc: Shibboleth alias string in server header ($_SERVER)
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethUserEmailDesc: Shibboleth email string in server header ($_SERVER)
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethUserLoginDesc: Shibboleth uid or login string in server header ($_SERVER)
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupLdapActiveDesc: Searches LDAP for the domain from the group name.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupsContainsDomainDesc: The domain can be fetched from the group name. Using the regex (.*) at the end of the group name.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupsDesc: The View groups here will be compared to the user groups from Shibboleth. According to the setting, if the group name includes the domain, it will be fetched. Else an attribute must be set, so the domain will be fetched from LDAP. If LDAP is used the DN must also be set.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupsLdapAttrDesc: Domain attribute for the LDAP group search. Will be used when LDAP search is active.
LoginShibboleth.ShibbolethViewGroupsLdapDNDesc: Distinguished Names for the LDAP search. Will be used when LDAP search is active.
LoginShibboleth.plug-inDescription: Login plug-in which Shibboleth Authentication. Provide an a way to login with shibboleth/LDAP to Piwik.
